Name: Action
Description: Action films are built around a core set of characteristics such as spectacular physical action, a narrative emphasis on fights, chases, and explosions, as well as a combination of state-of-the-art special effects and stunt-work.

Name: Comedy
Description: Comedy is a genre of film in which the main emphasis is on humor. These films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and most often work by exaggerating characteristics for humorous effect.

Name: Thriller
Description: Thrillers tend to be action-packed, page-turners with moments full of tension, anxiety, and fear.

Name: Horror
Description: Seek to elicit responses of fear, terror, disgust, shock, suspense, and, of course, horror from their viewers.
